title: (x) The Home Edition book cover/Nike advert - ITC Grouch/Futura Cond {Florian H}
content:
hey, can anyone here give me a hand in identifying these 2 typefaces? Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [106995004.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/typophile.com/files/106995004.jpg) | 17.45 KB |
| [nike-vintage\_bem-resolvida.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/typophile.com/files/nike-vintage_bem-resolvida.jpg) | 113.57 KB |

 [‹ (x) Who created Alphabet 26? - Bradbury Thompson {Dan Reynolds}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39888 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need a typical face from the 60s for a book about a photographer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39890 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j. cullen

comments.content:
Hi James,

the first one is a little bit too small to be sure, but I’d say [Grouch](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-grouch/).  
And the second is some black condensed flavour of [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/futura-nd/familytree.html).  
F
Thank’n you...i appreciate your help mate...thanks alot
